about_the_game:
- The banshee paint override features a beautiful bioluminescent pattern that glows in the dark.

- The character set includes a cosmetic head gear, arm gear, leg gear, torso gear, and waist gear.

- The weapon set includes a cosmetic weapon pattern and weapon decal.

This pack contains virtual currency for in-game use only. The Starter Pack can only be purchased once per user account and platform. Base game required to use Starter Pack.
detailed_description:
- The banshee paint override features a beautiful bioluminescent pattern that glows in the dark.

- The character set includes a cosmetic head gear, arm gear, leg gear, torso gear, and waist gear.

- The weapon set includes a cosmetic weapon pattern and weapon decal.

This pack contains virtual currency for in-game use only. The Starter Pack can only be purchased once per user account and platform. Base game required to use Starter Pack.

short_description: The Storm Chaser Starter Pack includes a cosmetic bioluminescent banshee paint override, character set, weapon set, and 4,600 tokens to unlock new gear, weapons, banshee gear, and more!
supported_languages:
English*, French*, Italian, German*, Spanish - Spain*, Arabic, Japanese, Korean, Polish, Portuguese - Brazil*, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese
*languages with full audio support
